parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the current music volume to the given value smoothly within the given time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''fadeMusic''' volume

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]  - fade interval in seconds

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> volume: [[Number]] - music volume range 0 to 5. Maximum volume is 5. Default is 0.5.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>5 [[fadeMusic]] 0; // fade current music volume to 0 in 5 sec</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fadeSound]], [[fadeRadio]], [[fadeSpeech]], [[fadeEnvironment]], [[environmentVolume]], [[musicVolume]], [[soundVolume]], [[radioVolume]]
</value></part></template>
